page.title: 11Transport around Balsall (1)
page.content: Balsall Common is situated between Coventry, Birmingham, Redditch, and Leamington Spa. Motorways including the M1, M6, M5, and the proposed M40 surround Balsall Common on three sides none of them more than twenty miles away.The A452 runs right through the centre of the village so there is easy access to any jobs elsewhere. It also means that heavy snow in Winter is quickly cleared from the roads. But it also gives disadvantages, for the heavy vehicles disturb the foundations of buildings, the lead in the air is quite a lot and the noise is terrible especially at nights. Parking facilities are quite good because there are spaces marked outside the shops but unfortunatly there are always a lot of delivery vans parked outside them.There is also a car park opposite the station.
